section.title: CalendarRow.h
section.programlisting: 1 // Fill out your copyright notice in the Description page of Project Settings. 2 3 #pragma once 4 5 #include "CoreMinimal.h" 6 #include "UObject/NoExportTypes.h" 7 #include "CalendarUIBase.h" 8 #include "CalendarRow.generated.h" 9 17 USTRUCT(BlueprintType) 18 struct FMyBaseSructure 19 { 20 GENERATED_BODY() 21 22 23 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Calendar Properties") 24 int32 Row; 25 27 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Calendar Properties") 28 int32 Year; 29 31 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Calendar Properties") 32 int32 Month; 33 35 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Calendar Properties") 36 FLinearColor SelectedGridColor; 37 39 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Calendar Properties") 40 FLinearColor EmptyGridColor; 41 43 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Calendar Properties") 44 FLinearColor GridColor; 45 }; 46 53 UCLASS(BlueprintType) 54 class UCalendarRow : public UObject 55 { 56 GENERATED_BODY() 57 58 public: 70 UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Calendar Functions") 71 void Init( 72 int32 RowValue, 73 int32 year, 74 int32 month, 75 FLinearColor color1, 76 FLinearColor color2, 77 FLinearColor color3, 78 UCalendarUIBase* InOwner 79 ); 80 82 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Atm0s Calendar Variables") 83 FMyBaseSructure structure; 84 86 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Owner") 87 UCalendarUIBase* Owner; 88 };
